channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @dakini_3 Kansas is America.
item.source:markdown: @dakini_3 Kansas is America.

item.description: @brettglass it doesn't assume that.
item.source:markdown: @brettglass it doesn't assume that.

item.description: If the Democrats enjoyed politics even a little, we would be experiencing a huge wave of euphoria right now. We'd all be standing up in praise of Kansas, making the next state want to be next for FOMO. We'd be talking about what we can do next to make the US come together.
item.source:markdown: If the Democrats enjoyed politics even a little, we would be experiencing a huge wave of euphoria right now. We'd all be standing up in praise of Kansas, making the next state *want* to be next for FOMO. We'd be talking about what we can do next to make the US come together.

item.description: Electric truck showdown: Why I'd buy Rivian's R1T over the Ford F-150 Lightning after driving both. https://t.co/ZehNHuumKA
item.source:markdown: Electric truck showdown: Why I'd buy Rivian's R1T over the Ford F-150 Lightning after driving both. https://t.co/ZehNHuumKA

item.description:
@rswilbourn I hope it's more than that.

Can't wait to watch Ted Cruz try to pivot his way out of this. ;-)

Maybe we should have some referenda about gun rights.

@Scobleizer CarPlay and Android Auto are much safer than using the UI of the phone, which is how it works with Tesla. I wrote a longer post about that just now.

https://t.co/SHDJWpXUl5
item.source:markdown:
@Scobleizer CarPlay and Android Auto are much safer than using the UI of the phone, which is how it works with Tesla. I wrote a longer post about that just now.
https://t.co/SHDJWpXUl5

item.description: Honestly the Dems should hire me as their blogger.
item.source:markdown: Honestly the Dems should hire me as their blogger.

item.description: Joe when Kansas proves American isn't so fucked, run this image. No charge. https://t.co/NV6iis2zyZ
item.source:markdown: Joe when Kansas proves American isn't so fucked, run this image. No charge. https://t.co/NV6iis2zyZ

item.description:
Our president god bless him, thinks it's about gas prices. It's about Kansas! That's all he should be talking about this morning. Tomorrow it will be something else.

Study Trump's tweets. Trump does that so well. Gas prices are old news. Old news Joe! Old. News. Joe. Move on. https://t.co/jiJyu7TYXX
item.source:markdown:
Our president god bless him, thinks it's about gas prices. It's about Kansas! That's all he should be talking about this morning. Tomorrow it will be something else.
Study Trump's tweets. Trump does that so well. Gas prices are old news. Old news Joe! Old. News. Joe. Move on. https://t.co/jiJyu7TYXX

item.description:
It's a "shockwave" only if you pay attention to what NPR thinks. I wish they would just stick to reporting facts.

https://t.co/Rl0xC14d8H
item.source:markdown:
It's a "shockwave" only if you pay attention to what NPR thinks. I wish they would just stick to reporting facts.
https://t.co/Rl0xC14d8H

item.description:
The news people report decidedly that American is totally fucked, and we think they have some way of measuring fucked-ness, but yesterday the people of Kansas proved that we're not quite as fucked as they say.

Another observation. If the Supreme Court is now made up of unelected politicians (it is), they are really shitty politicians. If they were smart they would have done the Dobbs thing after the midterms.
item.source:markdown:
The news people report decidedly that American is totally fucked, and we think they have some way of measuring fucked-ness, but yesterday the people of Kansas proved that we're not quite as fucked as they say.
Another observation. If the Supreme Court is now made up of unelected politicians (it is), they are really shitty politicians. If they were smart they would have done the Dobbs thing after the midterms.
